text: is a Japanese architect.Pogrebin, Robin. "Architectural Iconoclas Wins the Pritzker Prize,". New York Times, 18 March 2013; retrieved 2013-3-18. He was born in Seoul. In 2013, Ito won the Pritzker Prize. ==References== == Other websites == * Toyo Ito & Associates, Architects website Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese architects Category:Pritzker Architecture Prize winners Category:People from Seoul
title: Toyo Ito
